titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 974 entitled "A bill for the relief of Richard Kanehl of Mobile, Alambama." to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 688.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/19/1994--Introduced. Refers S. 974, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims, as a supplement to S. Res. 108, for a report thereon.
